abstract: Motorola chief executive Edward Zander and activist investor Carl Icahn have been at each other like “antsy pugilists trying to work the media for a prefight edge,” writes Roger O. Crockett in BusinessWeek. And Monday is fight day: Motorola’s annual shareholder meeting in Chicago.
lead_paragraph: Motorola chief executive Edward Zander and activist investor Carl Icahn have been at each other like “antsy pugilists trying to work the media for a prefight edge,” writes Roger O. Crockett in BusinessWeek. And Monday is fight day: Motorola’s annual shareholder meeting in Chicago.

headline.main: Investors Place Their Bets in Motorola Match-Up
